entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Whale Cove
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:24 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 35.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 35. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 52 this evening and minus 57 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
